original_text: Then these men were bound in their coats, their hosen, and their hats, and their other garments, and were cast into the midst of the burning fiery furnace.
korean_text: 그러자 그 사람들을 겉옷과 속옷과 모자와 다른 옷을 입은 채 결박하여 맹렬히 타는 풀무불 가운데에 던졌더라

sentences.original_text: Then these men were bound in their coats
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이 사람들은 그들의 겉옷에 묶였고

sentences.original_text: in their hosen, and their hats
and were cast into the midst
